<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - Find a record and update its key or add a new record, if found.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spirvglobalregistry/#ab6f6cbbfa318b48e44bd1d86a483b05a"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spirvglobalregistry/#ab6f6cbbfa318b48e44bd1d86a483b05a">updateIfExistAssignPtrTypeInstr</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;OldVal, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;NewVal,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                       </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DeleteOld) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callinst">CallInst</a> &#42;CI = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spirvglobalregistry/#af5f6ee60206f6ab5be7346e8125c3327">findAssignPtrTypeInstr</a>(OldVal)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (DeleteOld)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">      AssignPtrTypeInstr&#91;NewVal&#93; = CI;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A registry of mutated values</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (see &#96;SPIRVPrepareFunctions::removeAggregateTypesFromSignature()&#96;):</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - Add a record.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spirvglobalregistry/#a797b7143b1b61fcf9445079c949e5d83"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spirvglobalregistry/#a797b7143b1b61fcf9445079c949e5d83">addMutated</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Val, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;Ty) &#123; MutatedAggRet&#91;Val&#93; = Ty; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// - Find a record.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spirvglobalregistry/#a928d32be153c2a7382697834cb0b7910"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spirvglobalregistry/#a928d32be153c2a7382697834cb0b7910">findMutated</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Val) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"></CodeLine>
